software.name: Samurai Wallet
software.description: The most popular and effective Bitcoin privacy wallet. Keep your identity masked and your transaction private

software.name: Sparrow Wallet
software.description: It is a Bitcoin wallet for those who value financial self sovereignty. Sparrow’s emphasis is on security, privacy and usability

software.name: Electrum
software.description: It is focus is speed, with low resource usage and simplifying Bitcoin

software.name: Specter Wallet
software.description: Trust minimised signing devices running Specter open source firmware

software.name: Muun
software.description: Simple and powerful. Just like bitcoin. Muun is a self-custodial wallet for bitcoin and lightning.

software.name: Zeus
software.description: Lightning in the palm of your hand

software.name: Blixt
software.description: Blixt Wallet is a non-custodial open-source Bitcoin Lightning Wallet for Android and iOS with a focus on usability and user experience

software.name: Phoenix
software.description: It is a Bitcoin wallet. It allows you to send and receive bitcoins

software.name: Breez
software.description: Lightning Fast Bitcoin Payments. Breez is the simplest, fastest and safest way to spend your bitcoins

software.name: Simple Bitcoin Wallet
software.description: It is an open-source, non-custodial, autonomous wallet for Android devices which can store, send and receive bitcoins

software.name: Nunchuck
software.description: Nunchuk is the safest self-custody solution for your bitcoin

software.name: MyCitadel
software.description: Ultimate digital sovereignity. Do a reliable hodling, organizational, & current accounts – or instant Lightning payments

software.name: Jam
software.description: Your sats. Your privacy. Your profit. Financial privacy, decentralized

software.name: Open Bitcoin Wallet
software.description: Android Bitcoin and Lightning wallet, a fork of Simple Bitcoin Wallet focused on providing a pleasant and simple experience with advanced features.
